templates.message: Crashes should be reported on the official bug tracker, you can open a pre-filled bug report using Blender's menu Help > Report A bug. I also highly suggest you to visit [Troubleshooting > Crashes ‚Äî Blender Manual](https://docs.blender.org/manual/en/latest/troubleshooting/crash.html)

templates.title: Thanks Comment
templates.message: Hello and welcome. This site is not a regular forum, while commenting

is always nice, the best way to reward a good answer is to [upvote it](https://blender.stackexchange.com/help/why-vote), and if it completely solved your issue, [mark it as accepted](https://blender.stackexchange.com/help/accepted-answer) using the ‚úîÔ∏èbutton.
